item.title: PlotGen: Multi-Agent LLM-based Scientific Data Visualization via Multimodal Feedback
item.description: PlotGen: A novel multi-agent LLM framework automates accurate scientific data visualization via multimodal feedback, boosting novice productivity and improving visualization accuracy.
